ai.summary: A 9.2 km circular hike through woodland and countryside around Lavenham, starting near the medieval Lavenham Guildhall. The route weaves shaded woodland trails with quiet lanes, offering rural scenery, wildlife sightings, and a moderate challenge suitable for walkers with average fitness.
ai.terrain_summary: Predominantly woodland paths and country lanes. Expect well-trodden trails, some uneven ground, grassy verges, and occasional muddy sections after rain. Surfaces may vary from compact paths to soft forest floor.
ai.safety_notes: Wear sturdy footwear and weather-appropriate clothing. Stay on waymarked paths, watch for uneven ground and stiles, and be mindful of muddy sections after rain. Carry a map or offline navigation, a charged phone, and enough water. Keep dogs under control where required; watch for livestock and farm gates. Apply insect repellent in late spring and summer; check for ticks after woodland walks.
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn; peak times are late spring for bluebells and autumn for colorful foliage.

seo.title: Lavenham Woodland Walk – 9.2 km Moderate Hike near Lavenham Guildhall, Suffolk, England, UK
seo.meta_description: Discover the 9.2 km Lavenham Woodland Walk around Lavenham Guildhall in Suffolk, England. A moderate circular hike through woodland and village scenery, ideal for a day out.
